column4: hmm, well the xp install is new, so if the only danger is ruining it, I have no problem wading into unfamiliar territory.  I am talking to you from  my laptop
i suggest you explore the LiveCD and fdisk route first =)
Is the LiveCD different from the normal Ubuntu 10.4 install CD or is it just an option which can be selected from the install cd?
i'm not too familar with ubuntu's cd distributions
